channel.title: I have an error I need help with (Isn't that common :\ )

item.title: I have an error I need help with (Isn't that common :\ )
item.dc:creator: @Not_Pwnd Not Pwnd
item.description:
@Not_Pwnd wrote:

/END OF Construction/
/CLUE VOIDS AND OTHER STUFF/
// CLUE_00
public static int clue[] = {1,2,3,4,5};

If you want more indepth,

[code]/* Construction /
if(questid == 1)
{
if(playerLevel[24] >= 1)
{
if(absX < 3270 && absX > 3200)
{
if(absY < 2880 && absY > 2810)
{
sendMessage(“You Magically Construct A Dummy!”);
addSkillXP((5playerLevel[24]), 24);
makeGlobalObject(absX,absY-1,823,1,10);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need to be at the con site… Type ::construction”);
}
}
} else {
sendMessage(“You need A Higher Construction Level To Make This…”);
}
}
